definition: lit. isn't that a joy? (quote from Confucius)/fig. (jocularly) extremely/awfully
to blindly follow suit (idiom)/to imitate slavishly/to do what everyone else is doing
to blindly follow suit (idiom)/to imitate slavishly/to do what everyone else is doing
to say what everyone says (idiom)/to conform to what one perceives to be the majority view/to follow the herd
also known as/alternative name/to also be called

lit. water may keep the boat afloat but may also sink it (proverb)/fig. the people can support a regime or overturn it/if sth is used properly, one can benefit from it, otherwise it can do harm/things can be double-edged
pinyin: shui3 neng2 zai4 zhou1 , yi4 neng2 fu4 zhou1

sentences.english: Comparisons with our previous studies on the Yami children were included in the present report.
sentences.chinese: 本报告中亦包括与兰屿学童调查结果之比较。

sentences.english: The CD has also been released by the ROI, HK. , 2010.
sentences.chinese: 本曲CD亦已于2010年由香港龙音公司出品。

sentences.english: All things change, and we change with them.
sentences.chinese: 万物皆变，吾人亦当以变应之。

sentences.english: It is worth noting that the report also found the American border to be atr isk.
sentences.chinese: 值得注意的是，报告同时发现，美国边界亦岌岌可危。

sentences.english: Despite their many differences, there is a remarkable degree of homogeneity among them.
sentences.chinese: 他们的差异点虽多，但其间亦有极大的同质点。

sentences.english: The score has also been published by the Chinese Christian Literture Council Ltd. , HK. , 2005. …
sentences.chinese: 乐谱亦已于2005年由香港基督教文艺出版社出版。

sentences.english: They're also used to kill bacteria and prevent botulism.
sentences.chinese: 它们亦用于杀菌以及防止肉毒中毒。

sentences.english: As the bubble deflates, China's exports are normalizing.
sentences.chinese: 当泡沫消去，中国的出口亦回归正常化。

sentences.english: The interior of a Leather Tanner's workshop can make strong men retch.
sentences.chinese: 制革工坊内部的恶臭令壮汉亦不禁窒息。

sentences.english: As we worship Him with these songs, we shall be greatly blessed!
sentences.chinese: 当我们唱诗投入敬拜时，神的福气亦会随着降临。

sentences.english: Sign language service will also be provided at the public hearing.
sentences.chinese: 公听会亦会提供手语服务。

sentences.english: The Hong Kong team also won a bronze medal in the water ski team event.
sentences.chinese: 香港队在滑水队际赛中同时亦夺得一面铜牌。

sentences.english: Coincidentally, Li Fuxiu and Chen Zhongqiang met literature Ning, also from the chase after.
sentences.chinese: 事有凑巧，李复修及陈忠强遇见文学宁，亦从后追去。

sentences.english: And I’ve stifled in the muggy air of Hefei in Anhui.
sentences.chinese: 亦曾在安徽合肥的闷热天气中气喘如牛。

sentences.english: Nor the logistics of having staff support a distributed PC estate.
sentences.chinese: 亦不后勤学有职员支持一个分布的个人计算机庄园。

sentences.english: In China, some aero-engines start to use single crystal turbine blades in practice.
sentences.chinese: 在国内，某些发动机上亦开始使用单晶涡轮转子叶片。

definition: not necessarily/may not turn out to be/maybe not
down to/up to/to such an extent as to .../also written 以至於|以至于[yi3 zhi4 yu2]
one's old self/one's original self/what one has always been
its place/one's appointed place/the place for that
